name: The Brave Little Hamster
description:
You play as a brave little hamster exploring the house and finding sunflower seeds! Exploring is hard work, and every time you stop for a short nap, you somehow wind up back in your cage. How will you break out of this loop?

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • F - Interact
  • N - Force Nap
  • Esc - Skip Intro
